pullRequest.title: Make configuration section layout in AggregationBuilder more responsive
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR fixes the horizontal scrolling / overflow problem described in #7109 and also the vertical scrolling problem described in #7105 regarding the AggregationBuilder.
It looks like we could also get rid of MeasureDimensions, used in Widget.jsx, it is just passing the container height to its children, but I don't see any benefit. I am not doing this refactoring inside this PR, because I want to avoid a bigger layout change at this moment.
How Has This Been Tested?
Tested in Chrome, Firefox and Safari
Types of changes

 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Refactoring (non-breaking change)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)

Checklist:

 My code follows the code style of this project.
 My change requires a change to the documentation.
 I have updated the documentation accordingly.
 I have read the CONTRIBUTING document.
 I have added tests to cover my changes.

nodes.bodyText:
It's just a small implementation detail, but let's talk about the style prop. All I need to do is overwriting the top margin of one DescriptionBox inside the Aggregation Builder. I had two options:

The current way
Adding a styled-component inside the AggregationBuilder which extends the DescriptionBox
Requires the new component + adding a className prop + an && workaround for the css, to be more specific

It's the second time we are passing the style attribute as a prop to the inner component. Is it okay to do it this way?
